snippet: A former Marine already accused of killing four homeless men was charged with two new counts of murder in the stabbing deaths of his high school friend’s mother and older brother.
abstract: Itzcoatl Ocampo, former Marine already accused of killing four homeless men in Orange County, California, is charged with two new counts of murder in the stabbing deaths of his high school friend’s mother, Raquel Estrada, and older brother, Juan Herrera.
lead_paragraph: A former Marine already accused of killing four homeless men was charged with two new counts of murder in the stabbing deaths of his high school friend’s mother and older brother.

headline.main: California: Man Faces More Murder Counts
headline.print_headline: California: Man Faces More Murder Counts
